title.narrative: GBV prevention strategies and action plans are implemented by UN, government and civil society in a coordinated manner and are informed by voices of women survivors of violence

description.narrative: The outcome focuses on providing technical assistance to the Government and other stakeholders to facilitate coordinated GBV national strategies and action plans
